Literature.Title: Antibacterial and Antibiofilm Activities of a Novel Synthetic Cyclic Lipopeptide against Cariogenic Streptococcus mutans UA159
Literature.Author: Min KR, Galvis A, Williams B, Rayala R, Cudic P, Ajdic D

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=500 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:9% Hemolysis=1000 µg/ml,Human oral fibroblasts:50% Cell death=154 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus mutans UA159(MIC=2.8µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans UA159(MBC=6µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans UA159(MIC=5µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans UA159(MBC=20µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MIC=3.0µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans(MIC=2.0µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans(MBC=5-8µg/ml)
